sermons.title: Contentment and Youth
sermons.description: Contentment is a Godly discipline. The only place that we can find true contentment is in Christ Jesus our Lord. This message is directed mostly to youth, and covers and addresses some practical things that they deal with. Godliness with contentment is great gain.

sermons.title: The Significance Of The Christian Woman's Veiling
Weary Christians or Wary Christians
sermons.description: Are you as a Christian alert to the evil one, or have you become used to a sinful environment? There are a lot of calls in the Bible to awake. We don't have to be a "sitting duck" for the devil. Do you know when someone tells you an untruth? Includes a list of some common deceptions.

sermons.title: Will You Be His Disciple?
sermons.description: Jesus is calling to all people, from all walks of life, to 'come and follow Me'. His disciples left their occupations and their families to follow Him. This Man had nowhere to lay His head. He took them in a boat into a storm while He took a nap...but they followed. Will YOU be a disciple of such a Man?
